Review: Delivery was fast. But I don't find much difference on the drying time on my hair. Order on Sunday night, received in 2 days time. All in good condition. with free brush & comb. Worth to buy. Ordered on Sat and received on Tues. v fast delivery and item received in good order. Got at 484 after using stacked coupons and 9.9 sale. Glad I caved in and jumped on the bandwagon. Hair indeed dries faster and is non-frizzy!  Just received the much anticipated Dyson hair dryer only to find it was defective. The plate with the control buttons had a gap that couldnt be closed. The dryer was working fine, but for $599 this cant be it right? . Product received in excellent condition. Also managed to send in the warranty without problem. Thank you.Delivery by DHL was very fast. Ordered during the 9.9 sale and got delivered by Saturday noon. Nicely packed in original box. Have problem with the warranty registration though. Ordered on 9/9 evening, received 11/9 afternoon. Fast and good. Got it at $464 after stacking all the coupons so easy! Product looks good. Hope it improves my hair! Thanks Dyson and DHL for the nice service! Ordered on 12/12 and Received on 17/12. Good buy with nice discount rate. Hope my gf like it. Excellent shopping experience. Good buy on 11.11. Registration for warranty is so easy on dyson site. Have started using it since received on 16.11. Love it. Brand new out of box got this peel off paint near the button. send me another set with another peel around the button. right now waiting for 3rd set replacement. does dyson really QC their product? Couldn't register warranty online. It keeps saying we couldn't find this product during registration. Other than that product works great. Otherwise I would have given 5 stars. Dear seller, how to register warranty? Disappointed with the product, the styling attachment cover came off after less than 1 month of usage, placed order on 3 Jan. Seller could you let me know how can I rectify this? Edit: seller has been very helpful and responsive to resolve my issue, thanks very much!

Arrived promptly (ie next day after order made) Product arrived in good condition. Good product. Well done KR Tech/ Those are amazing headphones in terms of sound quality. Seller send them over rather quickly. However, I need them for my work PC, and here I have extreme stuttering and they are outright unusable. Already upgraded to the latest firmware. After some research there are many people having the same issue without solution. Sony doesn't seem to care... Once and for all, my last Sonys. As a workaround will be using external dongle. Hope this will work. KR Tech is a good shop, can only recommend. Received within 5 days of ordering. Might have received it even earlier if I was't ordering it during peak season (9/9 sale). Cheapest price I found on Lazada (there are some seller offering at >S$100 but as the saying goes, if it's too good to be true, then it's probably not true.), and received a Photofast micro-SD card to USB/USB-C. lightning adaptor as a gift which was a nice surprise. 9.9/10. Would have given a perfect 10 if there was an option to chose the colour, but overall, I am very pleased with my purchase.  Review on seller: Legit product. You can trust them to send your purchase on time. They also provided a nice handy bag for free as promised. Review on the Sony earbuds: I own a jaybird sports and spent roughy the same amount or even more. I still use them now for sports as Sony WF-1000XM3 does not fully provide good in ear hook support as it was not design for sports in the first place. Its not sweat proof as well but wait, in my 2 weeks of usage on this earbud to be fair, it never drop out of my ear ever once even when i am running a 100 meters sprint to catch my bus. On first use, u might find left bud constantly disconnecting, but after installing the sony app and updating the hardware wirelessly, Sony WF-1000XM3 became the best earbud I have ever owned. This earbuds pack a good punch on the bass and sound clarity which u can adjust in the app. A daily usage of 2hrs and so far, i only did a full charge once. Ambient sounds can be on and off in a tap. Its an absolute great buy. Ordered on 18 Jun 20 and received the next day! Kudo to the seller for the prompt delivery! Bought this as a gift so I cant comment on the product itself. Its also why I paid more (compared to the other seller) to have the local SONY manufacturer warranty. Very fast delivery, ordered on Friday night delivered on Monday before noon. Box not dented and in very good condition. Product is very good as well. Original sony Singapore warranty 15 month,fast deliver!but I feel connection weak always DC/delay on right side earphones when playing music...any solution?/Item received well package. And work well. The quality for this price during 9.9 is really snatch. Thanks seller for releasing such a good price. \Recommended Lazada store! Item arrived as advertised... and in double-quick fashion too. Placed an order on Friday morning, and it reached me two days later on Sunday evening. Tested them and they sound great. In the midst of updating firmware now so looking forward to them being better! Fast delivery. Ordered on 9 Sep, delivered on 12 Sep. Good received in good condition..
Authentic product, great noise cancelling at lower frequencies. Sound quality is excellent too. Extremely gd sound quality, connection is much better indoor compares to subway/underpass. Touch pad is much easier to use compared to other brands, well defined touch areas. Very comfortable fit, can be use long hours without feeling fatigue. Fast delivery. Comes with a water proof casing to prevent scratch. Test product and its awesome!!! Very happy with the purchase!\Item was nicely bubble wrapped when received. The protection case is made of silicon. (Carabiner not included) There are lots of ear tip sizes to choose from and it comes with a USB type C cable. Audio wise, it's excellent as per reviews! Received Sony WF-1000XM3 in good condition! c/w free light blue protection cover! Thanks for the prompt delivery!

Timely delivery and in good condition! No need for the screen protector as it is reflective, would rather not receive it. Great bundle! Kindle works well. Case fits perfectly and is in perfect condition. The quality of the case seems pretty good as well. Do take note that you cannot choose the case colour and that there is a GEEKBITE logo engraved on the case. I knew about it and didn't mind but some people may not like it. Came with a free screen protector but haven't used it as I like the matte feel of the screen. Delivery was quick and within the stated date range. i would not have bought it if i knew the cover had the geek bite text imprinted on it. honestly disappointed. . An hairline black line can be seen after a few days use.  The delivery takes literally 4 weeks to reach instead of 1-2 weeks as committed when purchase. delivered overall good condition with just little dent on box. strangely the device is default to french ad and store. I changed the store to English but ad are still french did not get the pouch due to stock limit but seller was kind to have option to request for pouch delivered later. The product looks good and delivery was in order, yet to set it up and use it though. The pouch and screen protector are nice as well. Excellent seller. I receive my reader just fine. All package intact and in record time. Would sure go back to purchase another device from them when the time arises. Came sealed in original packaging The screen protector fit perfectly! Delivery is superfast. Just takes 2 days to reach. Super friendly seller too. Seller helps to get extra screen protector without additional shipping charges!  The delivery was fast, it has reached me in 2 days upon purchasing! The item is in good condition too. Kindle arrived on time and in good condition. Seller provides good step by step instructions on how to buy and download e-books This is a very responsive and reliable seller. Ordered on Fri and received within a week. Order was processed within 3 days, as it was made on friday night. The delay was due to Ninja Van. Generous seller, package the kindle with free pouch and screen protector and promo code to buy the ebooks. The pouch given was good quality, sewing was very close to perfect. Effort put for this pouch Honest seller as well. The kindle received was sealed as you can see in picture. No issues with using the kindle at all. Kindle is working fine. Pasted the screen protector and it fit perfectly (no bubbles at all - unlike what the rest say. Thanks for the guide to using this kindle as well. It makes reading so much easier for me now. Thank you so much seller. Will come back to your shop for more! This is a very responsive and reliable seller. Ordered on Fri and received within a week. Order was processed within 3 days, as it was made on friday night. The delay was due to Ninja Van. Awesome shipping delivery. Received 2days after via speedpost and packaging was well handled. Love the free game given. 10/10 recommended
Item arrived well packed! love the extra accessories that came with the bundle. LOVE THE FREE GAME MORE ITS MY CHILDHOOD GAME OMG WELL DONE. Ordered on Thursday and received on Saturday. So far so good! Nice product. Fast delivery. Thank you seller. Fast and good.
Ordered on Friday and received the next Monday. Fast delivery and well packed, thanks!
Came with bubble wrap packaging. Works well and satisfied. Item came as described, all free gifts were OOS and seller said will send over when there's stock. 23 days since, and still waiting for good news. 22nd May Update: Seller have been contacting me about the details of the free gifts and i have received them in my mail. Oh boy the joycon grips covers are good. They fit well and have handle bumps. The thumb covers comes with matching colours and even have a black pair as spare. Worth it.
fast delivery , good packing to prevent from damage ! thumbs up. Very fast delivery, bubble wrap! Now we are enjoying playing. Thank you seller. Highly recommended
This is the XKJ model with longer batt life. Everything is good and as expected. Seller is responsive as well
Authentic and local SG product well recieved. Double checked with Samsung and its verified 1 year warranty from official samsung store. So happy to receive it fast!!

very good product. Works as advertised. However we cant download the app in SG (only US app store). However the work around is by using the web PC setup page here alexa.amazon.com Seller ships fast. Received in good condition in just 3 days. Received good condition. fast delivery working good
The Echo 3 arrived within 2 days of ordering it and is exactly what I wanted. Very easy to connect to wifi and configure. A little complicated to set up! But finally works and well worth all the setup effort!
Set up instructions seem simple but in reality.....still not successful in setting up after trying 2 hours. You just can't find the Alexa app in the play store. Went down to the shop and the staff helped to settle the issue. Staff very patient and efficient.
Fast next day shipping, item came as ordered. Works perfectly..

shockingly fast. Ordered on the 12th received on the 13th. Faster and cheaper than ordering from Apple itself. Hopefully all is good with the watch itself. Fast delivery (3 days). Nice piece. Used for a few days everything seems like it work as it should, box came in sealed plastic, serial numbers match in the box, the headset and the menu. If don't mind buying from 3rd party with no sony warrenty but, seller warranty, and made in Malaysia, is worth the discount price. Also fast shipping. Hope can last long or seller honor warranty if break in a year. Product received extremely fast, within a week. Great job E-Nation. Good price, product as advertised ç. Just hope it last, the first version got from Sony flag store, full price, lasted less two years. Cracked hingers, spoiled mother board. Really fast delivery 1-2 days. Best Buy I had on Lazada.
